roleset.name: to word in a certain manner

example.name: all arguments
example.text: But [the proposals]-1 also display political savvy , [*]-1 couching some of the most controversial ideas in cautious language so as not [*-3] to alienate powerful conservatives in the government who [*T*-2] stand [*-4] to lose out if they are implemented [*-1] .
